CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Blue Owl Capital Corporation III Common Stock

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Blue Owl Capital Corporation (NYSE: OBDC) is a specialty finance and business development company (BDC) that provides direct lending solutions to U.S. middle-market companies. Our portfolio consists of predominantly senior secured loans that are directly originated by Blue Owl Credit's team of investment professionals.
